name: memory
description: Agent memory operations: save important context and recall it later using semantic search. Powered by local ChromaDB vector database.

commands.save: Store a memory with optional tags and metadata
commands.list: List all memories, optionally filtered by tags

inputs.name: CONTENT
inputs.description: For save: text to remember. For recall: search query.

notes: Uses local ChromaDB via the /memory API endpoints. No external dependencies.
